author: chirino
msg: - Implemented branch pruning in the BTree implementation.  Before empty branch nodes were not being freed up.
- The BTreeIndexBenchMark now runs fine without errors

author: jasha
msg: COCOON-2228 StripNameSpacesTransformer does not strip namespace prefix of attributes

author: rjung
msg: Remove recycle of B2CConverter when used for URI conversion.
Recycle was an empty method until recently. It now eats up
all bytes in the ByteChunk underlying the B2CConverter in
order to fix BZ44494. That's fine and necessary for the
B2CConverter use in InputBuffer at the end of request handling,
but here, in the case of URI conversion, the associated
ByteChunk comes from a convert call of a previous request
and we will destroy a ByteChunk we still need to use outside of the

msg: OPENJPA-702.  Update documentation for the DESCSTAT parameter for DB2 on z/OS.
